menu.city-text: Explore the city with our tour packages

menu.destinations-text: Explore destinations and plan your trip

menu.short-text: Convenient parking options for your short-term needs
menu.long-text: Affordable parking options for your extended travel plans
menu.rate-text: Check the rates and plan your parking budget
menu.rent-text: View the available rental options and select the best one for you

safety.text: Find out everything you need to know about the safety measures implemented to safeguard travellers against COVID-19.

ease.title: Convenience and Ease
ease.text: Our central location and wide range of flights make it easy for you to get to your destination without the need for long layovers.
ease.alt: A well-lit and modern airport terminal with a bustling crowd of travelers.

perf.title: On-time Performance
perf.text: We have a strong track record of on-time performance, so you can trust that you'll arrive at your destination on time.
perf.alt: An airplane taking off in mid-air with the airport waiting area visible in the foreground.

a11y.title: Amenities and Accesibility
a11y.text: Enjoy our range of amenities and services, recreational facilities and assistance for anyone with disabilities or special needs.
a11y.alt: A travelling business man relaxing in a lounge at the airport.

services.heading: Services that go far beyond the ordinary
services.sub: We offer exceptional services and amenities to make your travel experience comfortable and convenient.

1.title: Dining options
1.text: Satisfy your hunger with a variety of dining options at the airport, including restaurants, cafes, and snack bars.

2.title: Shopping
2.text: Find the perfect gift or treat yourself at the airport's retail options, including duty-free and souvenir shops.

3.title: Lounges
3.text: Relax in style at the airport's lounges, with comfortable seating and refreshments available.

4.title: Special assistance
4.text: We offer special assistance for passengers with disabilities or special needs, including pre-booking and wheelchair assistance.

5.title: Traveler information
5.text: Get the information you need for a smooth, stress-free travel experience, including currency exchange and baggage storage.

6.title: Transportation and parking
6.text: Easily access transportation and parking options at the airport, including rental car agencies and shuttle services.

7.title: Wi-Fi and charging stations
7.text: Stay connected with free Wi-Fi and charging stations available throughout the airport. Find out more about locations and login information.

8.title: Other amenities
8.text: Unwind and recharge at the airport with a range of amenities, including spas, gyms, and children's play areas.

first-class.title: Discover the Ultimate Travel Experience with First Class
first-class.text: Experience luxury and comfort with our first class services, including exclusive lounges, premium dining, and personalized assistance. Elevate your journey with us.

blog.heading: Around the World with us
blog.text: Discover travel tips, the latest news, and inspiration for your next adventure on our blog.

1.title: 5 Tips for Stress-Free Travel at Voe
1.text: Feeling overwhelmed by the thought of packing, navigating unfamiliar airports, and dealing with flight delays? We've got you covered with these 5 simple tips for stress-free travel at Voe. From packing essentials to preparing for flight delays, these tips will help you stay calm and focused on your journey.

2.title: Exploring the World's Most Beautiful Airports
2.text: Ready to be wowed by some of the world's most breathtaking airports? From futuristic designs to stunning natural landscapes, these airports are destinations in themselves. Get ready to be inspired by our top picks for the world's most beautiful airports, including Voe!

3.title: The Best Places to Eat at Voe Airport
3.text: When it comes to eating at Voe Airport, the options can be overwhelming. From fast food chains to fancy sit-down restaurants, how do you choose? Don't worry, we've done the legwork for you and compiled a list of the best places to eat at Voe Airport. From quick bites to sit-down meals, these options have got you covered.

4.title: New Nonstop Flight to Paris Now Available from Voe
4.text: Bonjour! We're excited to announce that we now offer a nonstop flight to the City of Love from Voe. Whether you're a seasoned traveler or planning your first trip abroad, this new flight makes it easier than ever to visit the stunning city of Paris. Don't wait, book your trip today and experience the romance and culture of Paris for yourself.

5.title: Voe Airport Unveils Major Expansion Plans
5.text: We're excited to announce that we're embarking on a major expansion project at Voe Airport to better serve the needs of our passengers. From new terminal buildings to additional parking options, these improvements will make your travel experience more convenient and enjoyable. Keep an eye out for updates as we work towards bringing these improvements to life.

6.title: Voe Airport Earns Top Safety Rating
6.text: Safety is our top priority at Voe Airport, and we're proud to announce that we've earned a top safety rating from industry experts. From rigorous training programs for our staff to state-of-the-art security systems, we're committed to providing a safe and secure environment for our passengers. We're thrilled to have received this recognition, and we'll continue to work hard to maintain the highest safety standards.

mail.heading: Join Our Mailing List
mail.text: Sign up for our mailing list to stay up to date on flight news, promotions, deals and exclusive offers.

name.label: Your Name
name.placeholder: Enter your first name or nick

footer.paragraph: Experience convenience and comfort at Voe airport - your gateway to the world of seamless and enjoyable travel.
